sense.name: making statements or assertions
sense.commentary: UTTERANCE[+action][+communication][+speech_act][+spoken] Note: refers to propositions, statements, not the linguistic forms, per se.
sense.examples: His summary amounted to the utterance of a few platitudes and nothing more. Her essay is an utterance of outrage at the political situation there.

sense.name: linguistic units of expression
sense.commentary: UTTERANCE[+entity][+symbolic][+unit][+linguistic][+speech] Note: refers to the linguistic forms themselves, not the propositions they denote.
sense.examples: This tape contains utterances from speakers of a now-dead Celtic language. You can hear the difference in the two dialects in the utterance of 'a' between voiced stops such as 'bad' and 'glad'
